attributes.action: Ensure No Sports Are Shown on the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like many people I do not like or watch sports on TV. I do not agree with the fact that my BBC licence fee is paying millions of pounds to show football and other sports when I don't even watch them. I think sports should be kept off terrestrial TV and made pay per view. Then licence payers get a fairer deal

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
